response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, we are confident it could potentially be worth up to $1,500,000. After careful consideration, we propose to sell this exceptional product to you for $1,400,000. This offer represents an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a price that is both fair and competitive. We look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 1400000}
